text: Pathian in Christa hi minpaamleiya kanathipi sik-ah anapejei, ama thisen sarna 3:25: ama thisen na. ama inpesuok na thina khan. jarra ngamna kha niralaangsik eii. Ama'n hiwa ithohi Pathian kadik kha minmuzoot jarra eii, ajarchu ama malung inkeikirna khan akatheng manu nileitho rakip-ah narachaak makjei.
